summary: REQ-5 appears implemented by adding a "Toiletries" entry (spelled correctly) to the Store Home page category list. However, the diff also modifies metadata/state summary files that were not requested by the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated frontend-file-summaries.txt content (project documentation/summary changes) beyond adding the Toiletries category.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks to add/fix the "Toiletries" category label on the Store Home page; it does not request updates to summary/documentation files.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated project_state.json (project tracking/state changes) beyond adding the Toiletries category.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not request modifications to project tracking/state files; only UI category list change is required.
